name: Alien Tag!
description:
Alien Tag! is a 2 player slitscreen co-op game made by a solo developer! Watch some of my videos here!

https://www.youtube.com/c/PhilDevelops

Trailer:

How to play:

If your looking to play on the web, head up to the top of this page and click the full screen button to play!

If your looking to download the game click download on the file named "AlienTag-Windows" and then unzip the file and click on the file names AlienTag.exe. Note that the game will only run on windows devices.

Community:

To talk to me and the community join here - https://discord.gg/dW8XPDA

Music:

Music is the only thing I did not make, it was made by -

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEbzPpn2IsnaefHzu0AqfLg/videos
